content: CP 680-P Cast-in firestop sleeve One-step firestop cast-in sleeve for plastic pipe penetrations through floors. Place it and forget it ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop devices and sleeves- - - ### FEATURES:Features Quick and simple installation – designed to increase your productivity and reduce labor costs Cast-in device allows attachment of modular accessories to cover all the requirements at your jobsite (slab thickness, W-rating, etc.) Peace of mind – cast-in devices remove scope for errors compared to traditional methods, leading to more reliable firestopping of vertical penetrations Creates an opening with the firestop already included – no coring or coming back for firestopping required Integrated moisture and smoke seal – no additional backfilling required Applications Concrete slabs built with traditional formwork or metal decking New building construction Sealing combustible penetrations Concrete floor assemblies rated up to 4 hours Adaptable for thicker decks (standard height 8) For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Height: 8 in LEED VOC: 1.4 g/l W-rating: Yes, with W-rating module Technical Data | LEED VOC | 1.4 g/l | W-rating | Yes, with W-rating module | Application temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2172996 - Cast-in device CP 680-P 2 - Package Size 1 pc - 2213356 - Cast-in device CP 680-P 3 - Package Size 1 pc - 2172997 - Cast-in device CP 680-P 4 - Package Size 1 pc - 2213357 - Cast-in device CP 680-P 6 - Package Size 1 pc
